xwikidoc.title: MoccaCalendarMacroTranslations
xwikidoc.content: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Calendario Mocca rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Muestra un Calendario rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Mostrar eventos de ... rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Los valores posibles son "wiki", "space" o "page", donde: "page": solo se incluirán eventos cuyas páginas son hijos de esta página, "space": solo se incluirán eventos que están en el espacio del documento de calendario, "wiki": se incluirá todos los eventos. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Página de calendario ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList'. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00). ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00). ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today. ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day ### Missing: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today.
